pages.text: $(li)Skeletons are common undead hostile creatures that can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low illuminance.$(br)$(li)They will fire $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) using their $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) upon death.
They will start to burn in contact with the sunlight.

$(li)Tiny Skeletons are a cute variant of the Skeletons and they can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They are faster than Skeletons.$(br)$(li)They will fire $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) using their $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Bows$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) upon death.
They will start to burn in contact with the sunlight.
